scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format esm,cjs --dts --external ai --external @ai-sdk/* --external @anthropic-ai/* --external @google/* --external openai --external @upstash/* --external @vercel/* --external better-sqlite3 --external pg --external mongodb --external @aws-sdk/* --external @aws-sdk/client-s3 --external @aws-sdk/lib-storage --external @aws-sdk/s3-request-presigner --external @aws-sdk/client-dynamodb --external @aws-sdk/types --external zod

comments.providers: DeepSeek API is compatible with OpenAI's format, so we use the OpenAI client with a custom baseURL
